import React from "react"; const Home = () => { return (
{/* Header Section */}

Welcome to the Sports Field Management Portal

A web portal built for field owners and captains to manage fields, schedules, and game events effortlessly.

{/* Features Section */}

Manage Fields

Streamline field management by updating availability, viewing schedules, and organizing subfields effectively.

Coordinate Games

Schedule games, reserve fields, and notify teams in one organized platform, ensuring smooth coordination.

Optimize Availability

Enable captains to check availability and manage bookings, enhancing field utilization and minimizing conflicts.

Real-Time Notifications

Keep field owners and captains updated with real-time notifications on schedule changes and important announcements.

{/* Call to Action */}

Ready to Simplify Your Field Management?

Join us today and experience efficient field and game management that saves time and enhances team coordination.

); }; export default Home;
